dublin_core.dcvalue: A mobile diagnostic system that allows health professionals to conduct ultrasound assessment at the point of care. MobiUS uses a smartphone (or tablet), transducer probe and software that enables providers to perform routine screenings, and diagnostic imaging.
Sailesh Chutani, CEO/Co-Founder, MobiSante, Email: sailesh.chutani@mobisante.com
WRF Capital, W Fund, Alliance of Angels
sensors and point-of-care diagnostics, electronic decision support, Non-communicable diseases, Maternal health
